# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it responsibly.

**Do not open a public issue.** Instead, please email the maintainer or use [GitHub's private vulnerability reporting](https://github.com/0BL1V10N1/personal-journal/security/advisories/new).

We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours and aim to provide a fix or mitigation as soon as possible.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| latest  | :white_check_mark: |
